Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Tasty snack bar, quality ingredients and lovely service. Definitely get the haloumi added to your wrap and don't forget a side of chips! Deceptively filling.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Amazing food and great staff! The place is extremely homey and clean. Plenty of vegetarian options and the best Egyptian falafel u can have in town! They also have fresh hibiscus homemade juice!

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Personally think that they have the best potato fries‚Äîextremely crispy outside and fresh. Also ordered the kimchi croquet and it was also extremely tasteful and delicious. Also recommend their burritos, falafel, and shawarma, generous amount of sauce, vegetables, and fillings. Love this place :)

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Best sweet potato fries, the halloumi wrap is to die for, the service is super friendly when not too busy.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: As a Belgian I can say that potato fries are running through my veins and after tasting a bunch in Amsterdam these are by far the best I could find yet. Surprised and delighted I also was recommended the falafel wrap which on my turn I ‚Ä¶

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Simple, lekker, reasonable prices. Definitely a perfect spot for a quick lunch!! I do love their sandwiches, Sabich is my fav!

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: best snack bar! it's a historic place, been in the neighborhood for over 15 years. staff is always super friendly and the food is DELICIOUS and affordable.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Yes! Open until late, perfect for late night dinner or snacks. Try the falafel with their home made sauces, the owner takes care of its customers.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Such a great place with high quality and affordable food and friendly staff. I come here often, and it's open till late. My favourite is falafel and shoarma wrap ‚ù§ Definetely recommend the place!

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: The kebab here I found to be less hot, but with more spices. It's typically North African. The addition of partially baked vegetables is delicious and rare in comparison to other similar places. It's recommended to eat freshly prepared, ‚Ä¶

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Love it!! Such fresh and tasty food. The falafel is delicious. My favourite falafel place in Amsterdam

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Nice people, good service and tasty food. The thing that I noticed is that their food smells s goed.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Possibly the best kapsalon I've ever had. You know the way the chips go all soggy? Doesn't with these super crispy ones, they remain perfectly crunchy even under the weight of a hearty pile of meat and cheese.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Absolutely lovely place. Its a home far away from home with good food, excellent service and a nice family feeling to it. I usually go for the just unbelievable Patat Stoofvlees (Beef Stew & Fries). The Buurman got this dish close to (if ‚Ä¶

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: De Buurman has so many delicious things - amazing falafel + veggie burito / vegan shoarma are also great.. Prices are very affordable and portions are super big. And the atmosphere is always good there - the staff is super friendly and makes jokes. I love this place.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Some of the best fries I‚Äôve had: thick and crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside. Not for you, if you love McD fries style.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: I live down the street and I had to set a rule to only go to Buurman once a week. It's highly addicting, fresh, reasonably priced, and the staff is always kind. Farouk (sorry if I spelled your name wrong) is such a boss, he always addresses ‚Ä¶

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Food is good but the place is small and it gets crowded because prices are reasonable  and cheap.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Some of the best handcut fries in the city. You can tast they only use fresh oil. Happy to support this local!

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: very chill people and delicious food. loved it!

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Local, cheap, friendly and good quality food with lots of vegetarian options

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Every time I am in Amsterdam, I go to De Buurman because I love their chicken kapsalon. It's the best in town. They also sell fries, burgers, and wings. The best part, everything is prepared fresh when you order.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Excellent Kapsalon, very friendly owner! We go here everytime we visit Amsterdam.

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: We love this place! Their food is phenomenal and very cheap considering it is in Amsterdam. 10/10 recommend. Also the owners are very sweet. Nothing but good things to say about this place

Name: De Buurman

Name: De Buurman
Review Text: Great, crispy and fresh falafel. Best I've had in Amsterdam. Friendly atmosphere. De Buurman is  located on a nice, sunny corner of the Van Hallstraat with tables outside. A really nice place to be on a warm and sunny day.

Name: De Buurman

Review Text: One of my favorite places in the neighborhood! All the food is super fresh and you can taste that it‚Äôs handmade. I also love the friendly people and the welcoming atmosphere at this place. Make sure to try the house lemonade with hibiscus!
